summary:
This MOD adds two kinds of physical attack staves for the Battlemages.
Battlemage\'s Heavy Staff and Light Staff. Simply.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Staff for Battlemage
Version: 1.0
Date: 15/03/2012
Author: m0m

Description
===========
This MOD adds two kinds of physical attack staves for the battlemages.
You can purchase them at the shop of each town.
You can also use keyboard shortcuts.
You cannot create them by blacksmith, but you can strengthen them by grindstone.

Have fun!


Install
=======
Simply extract to the ..\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\ folder.
Then, enable \"Staff for Battlemage.esp\" in the Skyrim launcher.


Uninstall
=========
Simply delete following 2 files.
\"..\\Skyrim\\Data\\Staff for Battlemage.esp\"
\"..\\Skyrim\\Data\\Staff for Battlemage.bsa\"


Release Info
============
v1.0 (15/03/2011) - Initial release

author: m0m
